msg: As per clarification from Servlet EG, version declared in web.xml does not control annotation scanning. I don't like it but the EG was very clear this was the intended behaviour.

author: orw
msg: #119945# - improved setting of OrdNums to reflect "nesting" of objects
- instead of adjusting the OrdNum of the "nested" object the OrdNum of the "parent" is adjusted.
